tip.ingametips.error.save_desc: An unknown error occurred while saving the file
tip.ingametips.error.desc: Please verify whether the Modpack has been installed successfully or report this issue
tip.ingametips.too_long: This tip appears excessively long, please review the list of unlocked ingametips
tip.ingametips.empty.title: Wow, there's nothing here
tip.ingametips.default.title: Welcome to The Winter Rescue!
tip.ingametips.default.desc1: Tips will appear here as you play, be sure to read them carefully!
tip.ingametips.default.desc2: To close, click the button in the top right corner. You can also use ยง6[TAB]ยงr and the mouse to select.
tip.ingametips.default2.title: Missed any ingametips?
tip.ingametips.default2.desc1: Open the chat screen, the button in the bottom right corner allows you to view all unlocked ingametips.
tip.ingametips.update.title: The Winter Rescue has a new update!
tip.ingametips.update.desc1: Click the button on the left to visit CurseForge and download the update.
tip.ingametips.music_warning.title: Wait!
tip.ingametips.music_warning.desc1: Turning off the music may affect your experience of the music we provide for The Winter Rescue.
tip.ingametips.music_warning.desc2: The vanilla music has already been disabled, If you want to re-enable it, please change it in the configuration file: '&7$configPath$\frostedheart-client.toml&r'
